name: WW2 Zombies Remake
description:
WW2 Zombies Remake is a top down shooter minigame project inspired by COD Zombies where you have to survive endless waves of zombies. Buy new weapons and upgrades to survive!

This game features:

  • Singleplayer and Multiplayer co-op mode (experimental)
  • Classic modern and WW2 weapons (from Thompson, M1 Garand to P-90)
  • Upgrades - health upgrade and weapon upgrade
